title: Love the products & prices; Need contact the individual seller link.
text: Loving TEMU tracking, delivery, prices, items & service! Especially like having the customer service people on the chats. They are knowledgeable, polite, & friendly. They have great patience too. They keep TEMU the best. I miss having the sellers available to explain things that is not explained in the ads. This feature was on TEMU BEFORE CHRISTMAS. The photography is excellent & the colors are accurate. I like that the sellers have put the dimensions of items in their photos. Really helps to know the size of items. I like the size guide feature where you measure your self and the fashions actually fit!!! Sight unseen; they fit!  I enjoy finding new stuff shopping here on TEMU. TEMU is a blessing; thanking Lord Jesus for you. And thank you for all your hard work during the Christmas season!

title: Five Star Fan of Temu
text:
I just discovered Temu at the beginning of the summer and I’m very pleased with everything I’ve ordered.  When shopping for clothes, I make a point of looking for user reviews with photos and so far, I’ve not had to return anything because of quality issues. I have gotten refunds on two items because of size or I accidentally ordered a duplicate of the same product; both times they told me to keep the product so I was able to gift them to someone else. I really appreciate the updates on my order status and like the fact that it is shipped via USPS, no worries about the delivery person stealing the order, as it’s my regular mail carrier. 

I’ve ordered household goods, bathroom and personal care items, home decor and clothing. I always get compliments on my clothes when I wear one of their pieces.

title: A clothing app that’s better than most retailers online
text: This app is awesome I got 20$ in free merchandise just for downloading the app and no shipping. I literally paid it not a dime for anything. I got three pairs of leggings and some lip balm that are great for nothing for just downloading it that’s a scam they did exactly what they said. They would do. Shipment came to me on time material and fabric was perfect. I have not been able to buy a better pair of leggings at Macy’s that I bought from Temu and the prices are crazy cheap but not cheap products if u catch my drift, no one paid me to write this I’m taking my time to do so because iv been looking for a app that won’t rip u off sell ur info or take ur money and give cheap crap or nothing at all and I finally found Temu and I want others to be as happy as I am will rock there products for as long as there open

title: Cheap Products and Misleading Promos
text: A lot of these products are just cheaply made in China. This company also gives all the users the “best promos ever”, such as 3 free gifts, free items through Fishland and Farmland, and other coupons. But what you don’t realize is that this company wants you to invite new members to create an account in order for you to get your free stuff. And while that’s all understandable, what isn’t realistic is that they require someone to have successfully invited like 100 people just to get a free item. No joke, when I first started Farmland and Fishland for two times worth like $40 combined, I easily filled up the gauge towards completing my goal. But the closer I reached the top of the gauge, I realized I got less and less for each referral until the gauge was only going up by 0.3%… Not even exaggerating. At this rate, I’ll have to invite the entire population in my city just to get a free item. Temu, if at first each invite/share gets me 20%, you could keep it consistent for the future shares instead of slowly decreasing the percentage. Shamefull.

title: Thank you for re shipping my package
text: I appreciate you all so much. I will continue buying things from Temu. It’s my favorite place to buy things. Everything Iv bought so far has been so worth it. Thank you so much for replacing a package that was misplaced and we never received. We brought my grandson with us from New Mexico to California. I told my daughter don’t even worry about it you don’t have to pack him any clothes Because I was thinking his clothes will be delivered by the time we get back. I get a text message my package was delivered but i called my neighbor to pick it up and there was no package. I had been calling and messaging SPEEDX the company that delivered it and I never got a reply. I decided to get in touch with someone from Temu and they resolved my issue right away. Thank you so much we really appreciate you guys. ❤️

title: They change things on a whim
text: I’ve been happy (for the most part) with all of my purchases, I also play the games and have gotten quite a few free items as well.  For some reason however, Temu has done away with the “add to wishlist” option when browsing through the categories.  They also change the benchmarks in the games so if you don’t invite 100 or so people to join you, you don’t earn the items before the game ends.  My friends don’t want to be blasted 24/7 with Temu invites if they don’t want them!  Bring the wishlist back, as the only way now to save an item you’re interested in is to add it directly to the cart.  I have seen items added to my cart by Temu that I never put there, so I’m thinking this is their way of forcing sales.  I just want to have a chance to look back over things that have caught my eye.  Stop mucking about!

title: It was so bad I moved away from my house
text: Well.. I order these lights and some other things and when I opened it I saw like 3 or 2 bugs takeaway I killed them, at least I thought, 3 days pass by and I’m sitting down listening to music when my husband and my daughter scream and they start running from my daughters bedroom and starts yelling that there’s 200 bugs in there, I looked and I saw many, I called the local number to help me get the bugs out and they had a whole big team and they told me I have to move, cause there’s more in the wall, and they can’t get it or reach it without damage and it was an apartment, so I moved out of there, now I’m writing this ridiculous review about this. Ugh I want a refund. And now I’m crying cause I need to find a new apartment and I’m never ever ordering from this dumb stupid “temu” stuff. GOOD DAY!

title: You will Like this site.
text: Yes everything is mostly from China. I have not been disappointed with any products. This being stated please read your descriptions and check your sizing. I have ordered numerous items across the board and have been satisfied with my purchases. I have compared item to item with other venders and Temu merchandise is cheaper by half or more and I don’t have to pay shipping. Temu backs up their merchandise and reimburses or replaces without any issues. We have more jobs than Americans to fill them. Just look when your out and about as everyone has a for hire sign in their window. Use to we were told to only buy American made to keep everyone working. Looks like that doesn’t hold water anymore. I worked hard for where I am now and enjoy my comforts. I will pay less when I can.

title: Spoil Yourself
text: Temu has provided affordability and ease in shopping. They have given a single mom to not have to go without things due to cost. It allows me the time to shop when I want to shop. Temu helps by adding helpful and recommended items for continued shopping or on a later order. I can’t run to Walmart, Target, Claire’s etc… without extra time, extra cash and extra gas to get these great deals. Also, I appreciate not paying high cost shipping like other sites. To new and veteran shoppers, their size guide is on the mark but remember that the size guides do differ on different clothing items which has been a tremendous help. I hope you enjoy Temu as much as I do.  Plan ahead for shipping time which isn’t long. I Can’t wait to order for birthdays, tokens of appreciation and holidays and save money. Thank YOU TEMU. 🤗

title: A Great Place To Shop With Cheap Prices
text:
Have bought quite a few things from Temu. 
A couple of things I bought that were under a dollar or two were kind of cheaply made but most worked well for me. 
The more higher priced items we got were just fine and most of the time 50% or more cheaper than you can get the same item from somewhere else. 
I think the only problem that I could complain about is not using boxes to ship some of their more delicate items in but I realize that’s more of a cost fro them and pricing to the customer may be more expensive. Also it can take more time to receive certain items but they are way faster than most overseas companies. 
All in all it’s a great place to shop for things you need especially once you figure out what not to buy.

title: So HAPPY I gave this site a chance
text:
I hesitated for a long time because I always figure, if it sounds too good to be true, it probably is.  The items & prices finally got me to take a risk.  Well I am so glad I did. I’ve tried all kinds of items, shoes, jewelry, clothes, kitchen appliances, wall art and storage items.  I have been 95% satisfied. Order arrive within 10 days & always complete. Most items are 100% 
Sometimes jewelry is smaller or larger than I imagined. I’m going to suggest they always have photo of someone wearing so it’s easier to know the size. 
Some of the cheaper items are not what I hoped for but with that said they always are usable. I have done 6 different orders with 10-20 items in each order & have not had to return anything.
If you are hesitant, I suggest go ahead, you will be happy you did.

title: Alright to shop, TERRIBLE for free gifts
text: This site is awesome for shopping & I don’t see many good deals on really cute items that are legit, this site surprised me with that.  Unfortunately their ‘free gifts’ promos…unless you have like 40 friends, or are willing to make multiple accounts for your benefit.. I wouldn't even bother.  I invited 10+ people to their free gift promo & each invite was a lower and LOWER cut than the last.  Made it near to impossible to obtain it, ended up at .10 cut left before it ended and it got removed completely.  Wasted 24 hrs trying to get friends & strangers to click my link and ‘join Temu’ all for nothing.  Like I said, unless you can get a HUGE following to click & participate in your link.  DONT. BOTHER.  And Temu obviously doesn’t allow negative reviews om their actual app in any caliber, so here’s my two cents here.  This also applies for the CASH PRIZE promo they offer.  Same thing.  IMPOSSIBLE.  You’re welcome in advance for saving you the time & heartache on that.  They just want more members and will do anything to get that.  Ridiculous

title: Pleasantly surprised
text:
I always thought Temu was a scam and I was afraid to order from them. Then one day I say some bras on the internet, a different site, and quite expensive so I passed.  Then Temu sent me an offer for the same bra-  six of them for about twelve bucks. So I ordered them. Not a big risk considering you get free shipping. 

First, I made a mistake when I put my address into their system. I typed 838 instead of 938 for my house number.  There is no house numbered 838, so I asked post office and they said it would probably be returned. 

So I went online, corrected my shipping address and ordered them a second time. 

They arrived in less than ten days. And I live love love them. Good quality, soft stretchy fabric provides ease in wearing. Lightly padded cup. Perfect. 

So I went back to my account online to say that I didn’t receive shipment, that it was my error, but that if package ever does catch up to them on a return from
Post office / would they kindly ship it back. To my utter delight, they immediately and unasked gave me a full refund. 

It has been a long time since I dealt with a company that provides this level of excellent service. Kudo’s to them on fairness, timeliness, price point!!!!, and customer satisfaction. 

I was leery. I am now a Temu shopper.

title: Nice Things
text: EveryBody should have some nice things in there life and Temo can help you out with some of things things with there prices and to the most part free shipping , Hey what can I say I have spent around $300 on this app , and I have got so much stuff , so all and all I’m mostly happy with everything , Except when it comes them making you think your getting free gift with free shipping , I see why the shipping is free the things they have you for the free gifts they take up 10 minutes or more of your time just to always leave you points and a money amount away from getting those free gifts , Love the app , love the stuff , But Wish will actually send you your free gifts , will write more after I see if my gifts tonight actually come , Thank you , I’m not trying to put the app down just if your not going to give the free gifts just don’t do the promo’s for them , Thank you

title: Temu changed my order and I never noticed
text: When I first ordered on Temu I ordered some good stuff and it actually came and this is the only bad incident that has happened to me my order was changed and my money that had went through never came back on my card I talked to customer service was really nice but I think somebody changed it to cover up the fact they changed it and kept the money my order was close to 17 dollars being 16 and some change but then I checked it again and the item I had ordered was not on the thing and I would know if someone had changed my order because it would have sent me a text but since no text was sent and they just took the 6 dollars I was upset because I really was looking forward to the item and when I finally check its gone that just makes me a little upset. I copied it but it doesn’t let me paste it on here but it shows 30 dollars when the items never added up to that much that they replaced the things with then changed the whole thing from there.

title: I had my doubts and they proved me wrong.
text: So i was getting all these invitations from Friends  and other social media and I downloaded it just to look at. I debated whether to order or not, because I have had the experience with companies like A***on that charge you and never deliver the merchandise. So I started slow because I was in love with a few things on the site…well I am hooked now! They delivered my entire order and I absolutely love the goodie’s I got. Now I have purchased another lot and I can hardly wait. Since the order was a few days late as a courtesy they refunded me and told me that since it was my first purchase if a got my order I could keep it! Now I have placed another order for a few more things and we are excited about buying more stuff after that. Thank you Temu!!! You guys rock!

title: “Free Gift”
text: It’s not a horrible app. But don’t get sucked into the “free gifts” games. At first they seem like it’ll be super easy. But the closer you get to achieving your “free gift” it becomes almost impossible. For example the fishland game the app has. Two free gifts and all you gotta do is feed the fish. But the closer you get, it’s near impossible to get enough fish food to feed them. I have .05 cents left toward my “free gift” but for 10 feed for the fish your only getting .06 percent which then eventually will drop down to .01 percent. Which if you do the math that’s 1,667 times to feed if it stays at .06 percent. When it drops down to .01 percent - you’re still having to use 10 feed for such a little amount. I get that a free gift shouldn’t be extremely easy, but they rope you into sharing and inviting new users and all that and make you think you’ll actually be able to use said free gift but then they stick you on stuff like this 🤷‍♀️

title: Great Store, my new favorite!!
text:
Amazing deals, cool features for adding to order, options on how you want to. Additional coupons, reductions and rewards (automatic visible and easily available to apply to purchases). 
Great variety of categories and products. Site is well designed to help you find similar products and replacement items if size or color is sold out. Also clearly states when  items are low quantity, numbers sold, how many * and reviews. 
I have made 3 large variety orders, and added more items to each (shipped together @ no cost).  So far everything has been excellent quality notwithstanding the price, a lot are equal or better quality than brand items I buy at prices not even comparable. I am impressed with the quality of my purchases, and at the price point, amazed!!!

title: GET THIS APP
text: I was very skeptical of ordering from this company I’m not gonna lie so I thought OK free shipping I can throw $20 away if I get the stuff and it’s garbage it is what it is but I just had to know. Let me tell you the products I received surpassed the quality I thought I would get every single one of them I spent $20 I got five things they were so amazing that the day after I got all of my stuff I placed another order I completed my Christmas shopping for for six people including their stocking stuffers for $100 free shipping I’m not kidding you folks get this app you will not regret it!!!!! I do have to say though I did not buy any clothing from them so I can’t say whether or not their clothes fit correctly until my next shipment comes because I may or may not have ordered myself an extremely cute top! Happy shopping

title: Addicting. Fun novelty items.
text: Temu is a massive shopping app. They have so many fun/cool gadgets and almost everything you can imagine. It’s addicting though. I could see myself over spending here. Not everything is 100% as advertised. But overall I’ve been satisfied. The only real issue is the reviews. I’m not sure if they’re written by bots or real people. They do express “issues” here and there with items they bought. However, almost every review has 5 ⭐️ stars. The reviews could sound like there’s something preventing them from using the product they bought, yet it shows they gave it five stars. Interesting. If they never even used a product and are experiencing something frustrating to even use the item, but they gave it 5 ⭐️ then it’s probably fake. Just be real about the reviews. Even the “disappointing” items I’ve gotten so far aren’t bad.

title: Too many games and pop-ups
text: I love to shop around on Temu. Sometimes looking for something specific sometimes to just look around. When I’m just looking I add things to my cart so I can remember them the next time I’m on to buy. But they flood you with texts telling you everything from the inventory of the item to their don’t forget the things you left in your cart. So now since I stopped the spam texting I go to look around and 15 minutes later I can actually shop. Even if you try to “X” out of the savings wheel it still spins it for you and you get sent on some wild goose chase of discount games and spinning wheels just to end up on a page that tells you you can have all this stuff that you’ve just won after you invite so many friend and they all make a purchase. I don’t see how this drums up business if anything we tell people to just go back to wish where they don’t aggravate the crap outa ya and actually let you shop. See ya around Temu good luck

title: Shopped several times/free shipping but one drawback to that
text: I've shopped on Temu about 4 or 5 times now. I love the app and makes shopping very easy. Prices are great. Most products are good,some are so so. Make sure you read reviews and look closely at photos and descriptions. My one complaint is how things are shipped. Some items come damaged bc they try to put almost everything in a plastic shipping bag. Some sellers bubble wrap but most do not. Items are in sealed plastic bags but the outer shipping bag is cheap with the Temu logo and gets tossed around in the airplane from China and again by UPS. Small items come USPS. Shipping is free so what can you say. Just wanted to make that comment bc I've spent over $200 shopping there and gotten many cool and useful items but the shipping bag had holes or tears. Just check everything against your shipment history to make sure everything came. There is no packing slip.

title: Just do it!!
text:
Hey!! So I’m a new customer here and I’ll start by saying it took me well over a month to finally order as it just seemed to good to be true! But then my daughter, her friends and others ordered so I took the jump and I’m soooo glad I did!! Everything I ordered is as pictured and described and seems to be good quality. The price point is amazing and I love that they offer payment options, because let’s be honest, it may be cheap, but then that means you get to order so much more at once! Lol And I got my order early! (By 6 days!) 

My only complaint would be ALL the free items they offer, in order to get any, you have to share so many times and/or have them join etc in order to get any of it and I feel you should at least get 1 or 2 freebies for just sharing maybe.. I have yet to get anything free out of all the offers. Still a good app to order from!

title: Wow Temu, just wow???
text: First, I absolutely love your product selection. I would have been content just from that experience alone. But why the '1 star' you ask? The TEMU gift card. This is so irresponsibly done that you ALL should be ashamed of yourselves. I logged in to a notification that stated your intent to give me 3 free gifts. So I'm spending an hour scrolling through carefully selecting 1 item from 3 cost levels. When I get done, Your site launches another screen that do a shell game with each of my desired picks. And, if I don't select the right choice, I lose what I picked. Luckily I got 2 out of 3, offering a 60% off. But, it doesn't end there. The choices that I did select were not given because I didn't want to go with 60% since it was initially 'supposed' to be a gift. So, I'm very disappointed. How can I TRUST a company that would promise me gifts THEN I discover these gifts can ONLY be obtained through a 2-bit shell game. Then, if I'm not already disgusted by this business practice after losing one item playing this game you offer me 60% off for it?!

title: Quality / delivery time
text:
The quality of the items I have received, which is a lot, has been wonderful.  Something I was worried about.  Was afraid of it being a scam but 100% it is NOT a scam!  Prices are great and quality is also great.

I was also  concerned about the length of time it would take to be delivered.  I have received several packages and have several more to come.  So far every package has come within 2 weeks of being shipped. 

HIGHLY recommend and have sent invites to all my family members.  AND if you send to 5 people and they download and open the app. you receive a free gift of your choice and they do not have to buy, but I guarantee they will.  You DO HAVE to choose gift prior to sending the invite!  Unless this was a promotion I just luckef upon but they are always running specials.

title: Good finds
text: This app has stuff I have never seen, down to things I have seen at Walmart that cost so much more. These days I’m on a budget more so do to all the high prices and a $1,718 mortgage. I don’t get to go shopping, because I have three kids and my kids and bills will always come first. I get on this app just to get something’s that I think the kids will like and things I can use around the house. If you live paycheck to paycheck and living off credit cards just to buy food and gas maybe using this app will help you cut down some costs. It does take some time to get. The first order I ever made not all things arrived in the package so they sent out a new package. I’m still waiting on it but I have received half of my second order and I got it in a little over a week. I do recommend this app.

title: BEFORE YOU GET THIS RED THIS REVIEW
text: This app has its pros and cons! listen to me the app is good but it’s mostly fake if I can be honest! The pros is that the app sends you the product maybe 2 or 3 weeks later when you buy it! However the con is that the app promotes these so called “giveaways” and “get free 5 gifts.” But they aren’t true, they’ll literally waste your precious time! You can say otherwise, but honestly this is my opinion from a REAL human, “but how do they waste my time?” Well I’ve spent my money on the app and I got my items a couple days later I was happy and all but I was quite dissatisfied and disappointed with the “giveaway” thing yes the quality of these products are well buying, but please don’t waste your time with trying to invite your friend to a app and then get dissatisfied with it because you invited him and you didn’t get your points because he has to join the app, then you have to gain his trust, overall the app is a 2 out of 5 stars, good products, but bad giveaways!

title: Great for Shopping for inexpensive Good items
text: I’ve ordered several things from here there is a lot of options for really cheap/Good quality stuff u need to read the items carefully the sizes are not always correct like the size u would normally buy in a store They have several different Companies to choose from and some are cheaper than others it doesn’t take long to receive ur items in the mail every thing I’ve ordered so far was what I expected it to be I love Shopping on here But there Games are very misleading in some ways I Think. U have to keep inviting ppl to join to be able to possibly Win I Done this for a long Time and still to today I haven’t ever Won Anything playing there games and some ppl I invited were New Users and Existing Users I did Win some Discounts I will Definitely Order More Stuff from them It was Worth every Penny 😊😊😳

title: Temu Report by Meredith
text:
I recently (April 2023) started using Temu.  I tried Temu because I am furnishing “mid-term” rentals and wanted a less expensive way to furnish 3 rentals at once. However, I am very conscious of having sturdy and very functional items that hold up well. We require high quality items to make our rentals stand out above the competition. I have ordered mostly kitchen items and so far I am very pleased with the look and quality. The prices are exceptionally low which is a bonus.  I am impressed with the price guarantee and I was able to try it today. I received a refund because some of the products received had a price reduction since I placed my order. After trying some of the products I even started a Facebook page to let my friends know about Temu. 

Meredith Carswell
Hickory, NC
Temu Report by Meredith

title: Love Temu!
text:
As a grandmother of seven grandchildren Temu is a the perfect place for online shopping. I am new to Temu… so far I am very pleased and happy with my recent purchase. My Order arrived early & was Complete. No problems! Purchased for my daughter & 2 of my granddaughters, clothing was true to size excellent quality, and most importantly, my grandkids love their beautiful dresses. They also immediately put their new dresses on, played with their unicorn stuffed animals, and then spent hours outside playing with the fairy garden. I also ordered spa like items for my daughter. She’s a stay at home. Mom loved her items and was extremely happy to receive them in the mail, SURPRISE!
I like the convenience of having everything shipped directly to them. My family all live in different states, this saved me time and money! I TEMU a 100% 4 star rating.

title: Nice app
text: You can find some really decent items. The delivery takes forever. They really need to incorporate USA sizes since they are appealing to US Shoppers. I tried it to see what their products were like. I’m like 50/50 on Temu. Please work something out for faster deliveries, and incorporating USA size charts. Overall, I still like Temu. Update: 2 weeks shipping is horrible. I have like 4 orders I’m waiting on. After I receive them, I’m deleting the app. Some products are super cheaply made, and I have thrown away quite a bit. I do not like Temu at all! Also, I purchased 2 outfits for toddlers. They were $6.98 each. During Thanksgiving/Black Friday those outfit prices changed to $18 each!!! Talk about trying to cheat people. The name of that particular shop is Sky Star. And not just this one, but many more! Hey Temu: Black Friday means lower price deals, not hike your prices deals. That amounts to dishonesty!!

title: Some funny business going on
text:
Trying to get some of the “free gifts”. It tells me to invite new users which I’ve done, but it doesn’t tell you how much credit you’ll earn for each user that accepts your invite.  As such your credits decrease or invitee as the invitees create accounts. For example first person I invited got me $2, but as I got closer to the amount I needed I earned less, and the last invitee got me only $.70. Then one of the new user invitees received my invite, clicked on it and set up an account but I never received ANY credit for that and their link says “invite already accepted” 
The fine print says if you send too many invites or a person receives too many invites the invites become invalid but they NEVER TELL YOU what number is too many. So as you try to figure out why an invite is isn’t working and send repeat ones, you’ll probably raise a red flag and make everything invalid. 
Long story short: the “free gifts” become unattainable since they keep moving the goal post and then shenanigans behind a closed door.

title: Cheap prices, but questionable, and annoying. (Fake reviews too.)
text: I guess it’s also worth mentioning that if you look at a lot of these reviews, a lot of them clearly look fake since they all mimic each other, saying word for word the exact same thing. That’s a little shady. I’m pulling off another star for that. It really is a place to get cheap items, so cheap that it almost makes me wonder who made them. The ethics of manufacturing come into question. That aside, so far, what I’ve gotten from there isn’t too bad. My main issue with it is, when you first sign up, it begs you to sign up for texting notifications. Absolutely begs you. It’ll beg you with a discount or whatever. And then, when you finally do give it your phone number, it’s absolutely bugs the crap out of you. Several texts a day. One a day is one thing. I’ve gotten several a day. so with the several texts per day, paired with the several notifications per day, it gets obnoxious fast.

title: games and offers too good to be true
text:
If you’re looking for a shop similar to aliexpress look no further. This place definitely has deals worth bragging about. 

My two stars refer to the bold marketing. Similar to a pyramid scheme, promises of endless free gifts are presented through their mini games. Seemingly attainable, their farm, fish, dart, and hat mini games offer a free gift. To keep you hooked, while you approach your goals they tack on more “free gifts”. I’ve successfully invited new users but to no avail. The quests become increasingly harder. The final fish food percentage drops down to a whopping .01%. You’d have to successfully invite 5-10 new users to obtain your promised free gifts. I am on the final day for fishland and I can clearly see its just a pipe dream. For the hat game they promised enough energy to flip the final card if I invited one more user. I did. And I received 1 energy as opposed to the promised amount. 

This is obviously a gimmick and their way to rake in new users to try and get more customers. While I do appreciate the deals I feel the games should stop promoting free gifts. They claim there are successful users who received all their gifts but what are the chances those aren’t just the same influencers who are promoting their invite codes. Either stop promoting free gifts or actually make them attainable. 

I wouldn’t recommend playing any of their games as you are simply giving them free publicity with nothing in return.

title: So here’s my reason for a 2
text:
Hook line and sinker. Myself and my partner both got this up. You know he lives in one area I live in another. And we noticed that we were getting the same thing. Of course we already knew it was a scheme. so they really in and they want you to win these great free prizes. I am constantly sending friends and new ppl to the app. I never got the prize. An it wasn’t bc I did not win. It was bc my referrals weren’t able to go to the “ game “ part. Bc it was either a broken link. Or it said the game was invalid. Or the fact that they couldn’t get on them bc the game ended ( no the game was still ongoing) sure you can get stuff for cheap. I’m just highly disappointed they weren’t playing fair. So as far as “ you can win free gifts” if it’s to good to be true. Well, then it is. It’s frustrating bc I feel this is a false advertisement. 
I wish they would keep there promises that are offered ( then again I am sure if that would happen. They wouldn’t have anything )

title: Make your own choice
text: I’ve had many people complain to me that Temu doesn’t come through and is a scam. Also heard that the site could be putting malware on devices… that being said; I PERSONALLY have had nothing but great experiences with them. Items were never late. Never damaged. I can’t speak for everyone, but I love Temu. I also have a pretty good security on my devices which are scanned regularly and have had no issues with that as well. Again, can’t speak for everyone but if asking me, you will hear nothing but great things. I also play the games on the website where you can earn free gifts of your choice, and won a bunch of items already. So to me, no matter where we shop or bank is not 100% safe. It’s a risk we all take everyday everywhere. You choose 💜

title: My TEMU experience
text:
I am delighted to be able to give a positive review and feedback about my experience with Temu.
Every item I have purchased and received has been delivered exactly in the time frame as I was given with the exception of one time and that was only a day late. Temu immediately put a refund in my account!
In using Temu, it has made my crafting more affordable and let me explore other crafting options that I might not otherwise have been able to.
Most of my purchases have been craft related but I also purchased some blouses. The quality was good and I have received so many compliments when I wear them.
Other items I have purchased have been kitchen related. I enjoyed them so much that I bought more to give to my family.
My other purchases have been garden related. I’m delighted to say that I’m getting ready to harvest potatoes from the potato bags I bought and planted in them.
I’m pleased that Temu really seems to be so customer service friendly.
I’m glad I made my first purchase and all of the subsequent purchases as a result of being so happy with what I’ve received.
Personally, I will continue to purchase from Temu and I sincerely hope that others are as satisfied with their service and products as I am.

title: Temu
text:
Ok.. so after I ordered I looked them up on BBB and they had terrible rating in fact they are not credentialed by BBB. That being said all the problems I read that people had I did not. I received my items within 3 weeks so I did get a $5 credit but had no complaints with all my items. Do not order from here if you need the item/s immediately. Know if you order that it could take a month to get to you. So I had no complaints because I was cool with it taking time. 
 The quality of the material of the clothes are not the best but you get what you pay for and they are true to the picture. All very cute and close to spot on to size. I had no issues with money being taken. It was exactly what I should’ve paid and did get my discounts. 
I highly recommended this site. I’m a fan!

title: Came out of my shell for this review!
text: I don’t normally write reviews for apps—or anything really, but Temu is an exception. It really is like a more reliable Wish. Everything I buy comes in the mail and works great for the most part. Obviously some things can be hit-or-miss, but that can be the case sometimes regardless of where you shop from if you’re not careful of what you’re buying. Everything is cheaper here with free shipping 24/7 and fast refunding if anything goes wrong, and the reviews on products are all legit. Really lives up to the motto of shopping like a billionaire. However, the concept of having little to no padding for protection inside of the packages is a little odd, and leaves a lot of item boxes beaten up by the time they get here, almost seeming used. But nothing has arrived broken yet!

title: Love Temu
text: Temu is amazing many thought it was just a new version of wish it’s not they don’t lie about products like wish does they tell you exactly what you are buying the sizes are listed exactly in inches for Americans the products come usually with in a week, I’ve already bought like 20 orders lol I’m addicted to it me and my wife.  Many items like shaving items range gear targets dog grooming and the prices are insane I ordered a 30$ dog grooming kit thinking at best it be ok back up it’s better than my 178$ set I have here it shaved both my doodles with out getting hot it’s wireless and I was so impressed I ordered a back up as well.  I’ve recommended to all my friends to get Temu it’s amazing and addictive if you are like me and get a lot of items for tools or gun range or like my guitar stuff you’ll gonna love it!

title: The app seems fake
text: Don’t get me wrong, i love temu but the app seems fake because whenever i play a game like fro example the 5 free gifts game, how come after i pick my 5 free gifts they take a bunch of money off but when i have the tiniest bit of money you guys take only cents off and in other games when we have to choose a card, i choose my card but somehow always get the good ones?? i feel like the games would be better if we actually had a chance to win the stuff. Temu is a good app with amazing products but why do the games have to be so hard, and there’s barley new users since this app is very popular so that’s what makes the game even more difficult cause there’s a limit of sending links to existing users but when i find a new user and they download the app and click the link i only get half of the price. Why do the games have to be so difficult just to win things !

title: My Favorite Place To Shop!!
text: I was skeptical at first ordering from this company because I had been through so many others that were ripoff’s. However I took a chance at ordering and I’m absolutely in love with this shop! I feel like I hit the jack pot! Everything that I have ordered from here from shoes, to clothes, to accessories is A plus; top shelf materials. It’s hard to find my size in other online stores but not here. They have every size, color and shape; and the best part is the quality and price. IT’S UNBEATABLE! No matter the occasion they have what you need and it ships and arrives in no time. The packaging isn’t the best because it has been sealed with loads of tape but it only reassures me that my package can’t be so easily damaged, broken or open. I AM A FOREVER CUSTOMER!!!!I’m spreading the word everywhere I go!

title: Great place to shop
text: This is a great place to shop but you have to watch what you buy. Some things aren’t true to size. Some things aren’t what they seem to be. Just be very careful what you buy. An example of what I’m talking about is I bought a doll for my granddaughter and it said it was a mini doll and when I got it, it was as little as my pinky finger. It’s cute but very small. The doll is mini but I would say that it looks like it’s a tiny doll. Then I bought tattoos for my grandson’s and they were larger than they should have been for small kids. They had the best advertising mixed up. Of course I can’t say much because most of the directions are written in Chinese or Japanese. I can’t really tell any difference can you? Just be careful about what you buy and what you want to get from them.

title: Fast shipping
text: I’m loving Temu! The shipping is usually pretty fast, within 10 days normally. Most products are good quality & great prices. I wish the coupon was offered more & the $100 credit could be used on the current order you are placing, especially if your ordering on a regular basis. I have ordered several times & have not received the $100 credit??? And the coupons are on a limited time frame, which I do not like. You only have alike a day or 2 to use them. I do love that you can actually talk to a person in customer service if needed! That is a plus for me! I hate when you have communicate through an email!!! I feel like it’s too much to explain a situation or just question you have, through an email. So thank you Temu for the personable Customer Service offered!

title: my Stanley cup dupe
text:
I ordered it, and I was really glad that it was 13 dollars, because the actual Stanley’s are 30 to 100 dollars. I was thinking in my brain when it was going to come, I just could not wait
           I got home one day and saw the package that said Temu on it, I was SO HAPPY I jiggled my keep in the door and picked up the packed, I opened that door, and tried to take my key out, but it was STUCK! I tried so hard to get it out, at that moment, I just YANKED it out with all my strength, I got it out, and closed the door, I opened my front door because I just went through my garage door, then I closed my door, I yeeted myself and the package on the couch, I tried to open it, but it was to hard, I ran to the kitchen to grab some scissors and cut the package open, and there it was…. Just beautiful SUCH GOOD QUALITY TOO!

title: Giant scam
text:
Never ordering from Temu again. I think it's a giant scam to keep your money in exchange for credit. Was board one night thought I would give it shot.
Just a bunch of loss leaders . You can buy everything you want. Then they say things are out stock after you have purchased . so they will give you a credit. Because who's is really going to try and take the time to get a 5$ back. Things are so cheap as it is that you get 3-5$credit but then it brings you back to the site to spend more. Then all your stuff is late then they offer another 5$ credit. So then it takes you back to their site.
Imagine if 1,000 people have something that's out of stock at 5$.
That's 5000$ they are keeping in cash. But they offer a credit to bring you back to the site . So now your like ok I have 5$ and you spend more. It's a big scam that's how they keep their prices low because they are keeping so much cash on the back end. And it’s always free shipping the timer in their site just restarts when it runs out.

title: temu PLS
text: ok temu is not bad actually i haven’t ordered anything yet but i see all reviews on tiktok it sounds good my friends use it the only problem i have with temu is that it’s not being fair every time i play a game to get a free gift i can never get it because i don’t have people to share this with no one really has the app and they think it’s a scam and when i share the game lowers my chances of getting the free gift and it’s really annoying and the dates on the package is confusing sometimes when my friend ordered it on the 10th it was expected on the 27th-30th it came on the 4th so idk temu can we pls just get the package the day it is expected and temu can u pls make the games fair or give us a chance to get the 3rd free package without sharing it’s just super unfair and it should be that when u can’t get the third one can only get the 2 i earned so pls temu do better.

title: Great items, customer service, deals!
text: Customer service is just the best, they really take care of their customers. Giant selection of fun items and clothes at good prices. Surprisingly decent quality too, most of the time. I’ve had a few issues with returns and shipping but Temu was super quick to help and make things right. I’ve continued to purchase because of how happy I am with their selection, prices, and especially the customer service and deals. Functionally, the app works well and I haven’t had issues with glitches. It is kind of an endless scroll setup with unlimited recommendations that can get repetitive, but it’s fun to browse! So many unique items you can’t get elsewhere. Shipping is slow but so far everything has arrived eventually in mostly fair condition.

title: Only good first 2 purchases
text: When you’re a new user you get one item for cheap and then 2 free items and your next purchase is 2 items cheap and 3 free. That is an amazing deal however don’t expect to get anything out of the games they’re incredibly RIGGED can’t tell you how many times it would tell me if I got this many points it would be complete and it wouldn’t be. Told me if I got enough coins I would get 2 dollars which would get me to my 150 reward. When I got the coins it only gave me 50 cents when it said 2 dollars so I’m still 50 cents away from the award that can only be redeemed if you invite someone that has never had the app before. It’s good for the first two purchases so make it count because you won’t get anything after like advertised. Also when you click back on a game they will advertise how to get more coins 3-4 times before it will actually let you back out.

title: Bad service and the bad app
text: I do not like this app because it tells me that I can get at least $100 worth of stuff and you know what I had to do. I had to put in my address and I didn’t get anything. I just tried inviting people and inviting people and when I got to the last person, I told me to add more five more people. do you know that’s ridiculous you know I spend hours and hours and hours on the app and it doesn’t give me nothing and people are not liking that especially my friend and also I hate the fact that he told me that I can get at least two free stuff from the app and you know what I had to do again put in my address and play a game and you know what I had to do play the game and again, and again, and again and again, and you know what I got nothing so with that type of stuff I do not like but with the other stuff it’s good that’s good customer service good shipping and stuff and yeah I just do not like the hundred dollar worth stuff for the free stuff because it’s not true in my eyes
